head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BEESEMYER, MARY TEBBE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BEESEMYER, MARY TEBBE

block.p: BEESEMYER-Mary Tebbe. Beloved mother of Fritz, Karla, Eric and Derek. Cherished mother-inlaw of Cynthia. Loving grandmother of Conor and Caelin. Dear friend of Randall and Christopher. Devoted resident of the Bronxville community. Services at the Reformed Church, Pondfield Rd & Midland Ave, Bronxville at 4pm on June 15. In lieu of flowers the family has requested contributions be made to Jansen Memorial Hospice, 69 Main St, Tuckahoe, NY 10707 or National Center for Tobacco-Free Kids. 1707 L St NW, Suite 800, WAshington, DC 20036.
